Name: Wild West Gringos
About the game: Did you wake up this morning thinking, 'Today is a damn good day for a decent duel'? Did you have an argument with that stranger in the saloon last night that really needs to be sorted out today? Do you still have sand in your boots from your last ride through the desert? Does your passport say something like 'Far, far away' or 'Wild Wild West' under 'Origin'? If you can answer even one of these questions with 'Yes!', then either someone has finally invented time travels or you are so damn ready for a game of 'Wild West Gringos' ... With today’s means, but with the charm of the old days: Wild West Gringos is a tribute to cult classics like Atari’s ‘Outlaw’ or ‘Gringos (The Duel)’ from Commodore 64. Choose your favorite gunslinger from a variety of characters and you’re ready to go – whether you’re playing alone against a computer gringo or against a friend. Features: 1 player mode against a computer gringo 2 player mode against a friend Many different characters to choose from A lot of different levels: choose between the classic duel scenarios or vast landscapes with hiding places Many collectibles like new weapons, medikits, money etc. Lively environment with quite a few animals, interacting audience, etc. Cross-platform: no matter if you play on mobile or PC Hiscores: increase your reward and reach the Top10 Stay undefeated as long as possible to achieve the highest possible reward! Now polish your boots, clean your revolver, and hit the road. It's almost High Noon!
